Segment.name: SAC
Segment.comment: To request or identify a service, promotion, allowance, or charge; to specify the amount or percentage for the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeIndicator
Field.comment: Code which indicates an allowance or charge for the service specified

Field.name: ServicePromotionAllowanceOrChargeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: AgencyServicePromotionAllowanceOrChargeCode
Field.comment: Agency maintained code identifying the service, promotion, allowance, or charge

Field.name: AllowanceChargePercentQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating on what basis allowance or charge percent is calculated

Field.name: Rate
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeMethodOfHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: OptionNumber
Field.comment: A unique number identifying available promotion or allowance options when more than one is offered

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: LanguageCode
Field.comment: Code designating the language used in text, from a standard code list maintained by the International Standards Organization (ISO 639)
